errors.error_description: The command `pip install langchain_openai==0.0.1 langchain_community==0.0.1` installs extremely old and likely incompatible versions of the libraries, which will cause errors when running the example code.
The environment variable `export` commands are placed after the Python code block. The script will fail because the API keys are not set when the Python code runs.
correction_candidates: Move the `export` commands to the top of the script file.
Place the `export` commands in a separate `.env` file and use a library like `python-dotenv` to load them.
Move the `export` commands to before the Python code block that requires them.
Set the environment variables directly within the Python script using `os.environ`.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `export` commands to before the Python code block that requires them.
